Single quote inside string causing syntax error. We shall use bind variable here.
fields.summary: Parameter is not properly quoted in DbNotificationListener.addWriteNotificationLog

ATTACHMENT ID: 12936749 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~daijy]
i think escape characters are required to be added while setting the string parameters like partitionObj . In mysql, the quotes are removed while storing strings and that will cause problem in json parsing while doing replication dump.
I tried and it does not affect parameterized query (attached test will produce "abcd" and "abc\d" respectively).

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12937070/JDBCTest.java
